## Mailroom Clerk/Messenger Services in the National Capital Region (NCR)
**Solicitation:** T8080-240091
**Request for Proposal (RFP):** Competitive - Open Bidding
### Overview
Transport Canada is seeking the services of a contractor to provide Mailroom services in the National Capital Region (NCR). The services include the careful and confidential handling, sorting, and delivering of Canada Post Mail and other bulk correspondence.

**Scope of Services:**
The scope of services covers approximately 32 organizations, located in approximately 25 different buildings in the NCR. Services will be required on a scheduled and unscheduled basis.

**Services to be Provided:**
The contractor will be required to provide:

* One (1) Driver
* Three (3) mailroom clerk/messengers, including one (1) team lead
* Mailroom services, including:
	+ Processing and sorting of mail items for internal and external offices
	+ Delivering mail items within the NCR

**Contract Term:**
The contract term is three (3) years, commencing on the contract award date. Two (2) optional one-year extensions are available.

**Procurement Category:**
Services

**Regions of Opportunity:**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and all other trade agreements cited in the [list provided].

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Tania Cantin at:
Email: [tania.cantin@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tania.cantin@tc.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 447-7499
